Commercial focus

Light commercial electrical in Allegan

We support select small businesses with planning-first electrical work: clear scope, tidy installs, and documentation that keeps inspections straightforward.

  • Commercial LED lighting retrofits
  • Commercial electrical maintenance
  • Electrical design consultation (planning + load approach)
Common calls

What we’re usually brought in for

  • Lighting issues, dimming/flicker, safety upgrades
  • Dedicated equipment circuits (shops, kitchens, HVAC)
  • Service upgrades and panel corrections
  • Troubleshooting for intermittent power loss

For general troubleshooting, see repairs & diagnostics.

AEO quick answer

Can you work around business hours?

Often, yes. Many commercial projects can be phased by area and scheduled to reduce downtime. We’ll confirm your hours, access, and safety requirements during the walkthrough.

Process

Commercial work that stays predictable

1) Walkthrough + scope

We confirm goals, constraints, and operational requirements (hours, access, safety, staging).

2) Plan + execute

Clean routing, correct protection, labeling, and a final walkthrough so your team knows what changed.

FAQs

Quick answers

Do you work on occupied businesses?
Yes. Many projects can be phased or scheduled around operating hours to reduce downtime.
Do you do troubleshooting for intermittent power loss?
Yes. We diagnose circuits and loads to isolate the fault and outline repair options before work starts.
Can you handle lighting retrofits?
Yes. We plan fixture types and controls, then install cleanly with testing and a clear handoff.
Do you offer maintenance plans?
Yes. We can schedule repeat visits (monthly/quarterly/annual) depending on equipment and downtime risk.
Do you handle hazardous locations?
If the environment is classified, we can evaluate requirements and plan equipment and methods accordingly. Call to confirm scope and compliance needs.

Need help today?

Call for urgent troubleshooting or schedule planned work via booking.
